menProducts.name: Double Down Western Boot
menProducts.description: This exquisite boot is handcrafted from a mix of exotic hide and premium leather. What you can't see (but definitely feel) is the comfort and stability.

menProducts.name: Snowman Western Boot
menProducts.description: A narrow cutter toe, roughout foot, and bold shaft pattern make a striking statement. Superior comfort and stability, plus an extra layer of heel-to-toe cushioning.

menProducts.name: Denton Western Boot
menProducts.description: This performance boot features beautiful caiman alligator belly alongside a durable DualPro® sole that can stand up to frequent wear.

menProducts.name: M1 Low Rise Bootcut Jean
menProducts.description: Lighten up your jeans drawer with this ultra-comfortable pair. Relaxed through the waist, hip and thigh, they’re easy to wear and easy on the eyes

menProducts.name: M2 Relaxed Boot Cut Jean
menProducts.description: This is go-anywhere, do-anything denim. Ready to work hard or play hard, our relaxed-fit M2 has a stackable, boot-cut leg for a classic look.

menProducts.name: M3 Coltrane Boot Cut Jean
menProducts.description: A modern take on a classic style. Comfortable and durable, our boot cut M4 is relaxed through the hip and thigh for a fit that looks good on everyone.
